participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, enjoys family time and relaxation.
participant_1.background: i walk three miles every day. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i am a baby delivery nurse.

participant_2.name: Zach
participant_2.personality: Introverted and innovative, fascinated by technology and gaming.
participant_2.background: i am a recluse. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water.
